definitions.definition: Burdensome or hindering, as a weight or drag; vexatious
Not easily managed or handled; awkward; clumsy.
definitions.example: Cumbersome machines can endanger operators and slow down production.

definitions.definition: Hard, difficult, demanding to handle or get around with.
definitions.example: A slaves' work was as cumbersome as toiling on the fields, or in the mines.
